description: The Camellia japonica 'April Dawn' is an amazing plant species with its large, snow-white blooms and dark, glossy green leaves. The flowers bloom throughout the year, producing fragrant, semi-double blooms from spring to summer. This species is also cold hardy and tolerant of a variety of conditions. As a bonus, they also thrive with minimal water, making them a great option for the drought-tolerant garden. The beautiful, hardy Camellia japonica 'April Dawn' is an exceptional plant to enhance any outdoor landscape.
